txt.en: Give a tasty treat to a Noman-lands tortoise
Give a tasty treat to a Rauros snapper
Give a tasty treat to a Dunbog cooter
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should speak with Radagast.
'Use the special food I have given you.'
'I am glad your travels were a success.'
Turtles can be found all over Middle-earth.\n\nRescue turtles using Radagast's calming treats.
Give a tasty treat to a Long Lake loggerhead
Give a tasty treat to an Entwash slowpoke
You give a tasty treat to the turtle to calm him down!
You give a tasty treat to the turtle to calm him down!
You give a tasty treat to the turtle!
'Use the special food I have given you to befriend some turtles. They'll be safe in Rhosgobel where I can tend to them. I'm counting on you, [placeholder].'
You give a tasty treat to the turtle!
Speak with Radagast
You give a tasty treat to the turtle!
Now what do we have here?
Befriending Critters: Casting Shells
Radagast the Brown asks you help him rescue turtles and bring them back to the safety of Rhosgobel.

'Ah, thank you! I see you were able to bring back a couple of turtles with you. I am glad your travels were a success.\n\n'You have a good rapport with the animals. This skill will aid you on your journeys ahead.'
